text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse For 70 Days @realDonaldTrump ignored #COVID19
Over 2.5 million infections
Over 130,000 and counting has died from #CoronavirusPandemic 
Over 40 million unemployed.
 
Donald J Trump has destroyed our economy, health care systems and he is The Harbinger of Death.
